data.name: Dead Zone
data.detailed_description:
Set in the grim near future, humanity has been unable to control a deadly pandemic. As a novel corona virus spread in the early 2020s governments failed to react with effective measures to prevent the spread. As a result the world descended into anarchy as new variants merged, deadly and more infectious than the last. By 2022 the virus mutated again dubbed 'cV-19-8b', commonly known as the 'Blue Flu'. Infected individuals displayed violent behaviour and animalistic thinking only after seconds of being infected. Only 1 in 10,000 were immune from this strain... You are one of these lucky few.

You get to play as a survivor who has to survive the unforgiving world with a wide and devastating array of arms and equipment. With 9 different weapon types you'll be sure to find one that fits your play style! As you fight through hordes of infected and loot essential items to your survival you'll level up and gain skill points to upgrade your performance. You can then sell and trade your loot with other survivors in safe zones known as 'Outposts'. Interact with the world through the lives of the survivors, outpost missions, map events and much more! However, every action has consequences on your reputation. With animals, infected, survivors, bandits and more; you'll have a unique situations to engage with every time!

KEY FEATURES
  • It's FREE!
  • Over 10 infected types per zone!
  • Over 100 lootable items per zone!
  • Over 30 deadly weapons per zone!
  • AI driven auction houses in each outpost!
  • Randomly generated environment scenario's!
  • Ever expanding missions and lore!
  • Upgradable stat system!
  • Crafting!
  • Player customisation!

data.short_description: Gathering Storm Studio proudly present Dead Zone. Inspired by Retro Top-Down Arcade Shooters : Dead Zone offers a unique gaming experience within the modern zombie apocalypse genre. Where you have to loot, trade, craft and shoot your way to survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i7 / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Dead Zone features large amounts of blood and other gore. It also includes explicit scenes, phrases and other imagery.
